summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4249 for the improvement of Western Avenue (central portion) from University Street to Virginia Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 50485, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
